Expert Solution Provider | IOS Development | Software Developer | CEO

BuildeUX.Com is a company dedicated to Integrating your websites to Sales Simplicity.  Go to BuilderUX.com and see what we can do for your company.  We reduce the cost and time for a builder to get their website up and running.  We remove duplicate data entry completely by pulling the data out of Sales Simplicity and creating WordPress Plugins to automate this process.  Our Wordpress Plugins take on the style of the theme you have created or styled if it is a bootstrap theme. The plugins we create are responsive and work on both mobile devices as well as the on a computer browser.
Expert Solution Provider |  IOS Application Architect | Software Developer

Go to http://www.driftdevelopment.com and see how we can help you develop your next mobile application. We just got done with a BLE project that sets the pace for the medical community.  As a consulting company we walk into a company and provide a end to end solution.  That means we never leave you with the slack and say its your fault.  When we leave your company you are 100% happy with the product you pay us to create.
Project Manager | Software Developer | Software Architect

Sales Simplicity is the #1 Sales CRM company in the builder industry.  At Sales Simplicity I helped bring the company into the .Net world from a VB6 project.  I managed the team of developers that made this happen.  I brought the Agile SCRUM methodology to promote maximum speed development.  Choosing to bring automated testing and continuous integration into the company to make the QA process more tightly integrated and to provide a much more reliable product. I also changed how the company did business by bringing in over seas employees to reduce cost and make the consversion go significantly faster.

RiconLLC is an up and comping company.  It branches into multiple spaces from IOS and Android Software development to online marketing.  We took a car business in Chandler Arizona and were able to double its sales by redesigning how it marketed its product online.  We took this strategy nationwide and made a huge impact on how business was done in the future.  We were able to automate this process and change how marketing was done in the future.
Expert Problem Solver |  SQL Server Developer | Integration Developer

I analyzed the partner companies and created the appropriate integrations to make data flow seamlessly to the 2 systems.  I created webservices to bring data in form 3rd party software to be brought into Sales Simplicity.  I architected the database to make this data pass into Sales Simplicity as fast as possible.  This was key in making Sales Simplicity the #1 Sales and CRM in the builder industry.

summary: I am passionate about building teams through teaching and camaraderie.  I enjoy motivating those teams to project completion.  The people who work with me respect me and everyone around me feels like an equal even the newest programmer on the team.  I understand people and technology like no one else. I bridge the technological gap for the people around me who don't understand technology.  I have an uncanny ability to get down to the problem without clouding the waters. Any company I have ever worked for I have improved and I have brought outrageous ides to that company and I have made them a reality.  I am humble I am a get down to business kind of manager.  Connect with me or send me an email to ricolifts@gmail.com. You can also visit http://driftdevelopment.com for more information
